Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.loggers

Class BaseLogger

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.loggers.BaseLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger, Listener, MessageTransceiver, Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.comparison.Filtered<LogEntry>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Flushable<Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsoleLogger, LogServiceLogger, NullLogger
public abstract class BaseLogger extends Object implements Logger
Base implementation of the Logger interface
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
